text: Andreas Eriksson is a contemporary visual artist living in Medelplana, Sweden. Eriksson was born 1975 in Björsäter, Västergötland, Sweden. Eriksson works mainly with painting, inspired by the nature around his studio. He also works with sculpture and photography. Eriksson represented Sweden at the 2011 Venice Bienniale. == References == Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish contemporary artists Category:Swedish painters
title: Andreas Eriksson (visual artist)
